definition: sports equipment consisting of a sharp point on the sole of a shoe worn by athletes, manifest a sharp increase
details:
noun
- sports equipment consisting of a sharp point on the sole of a shoe worn by athletes
= example: sports equipment consisting of a sharp point on the sole of a shoe worn by athletes
- a large stout nail
= example: a large stout nail
- any holding device consisting of a rigid, sharp-pointed object
= example: any holding device consisting of a rigid, sharp-pointed object
= synonyms: spindle
- a long, thin sharp-pointed implement (wood or metal)
= example: a long, thin sharp-pointed implement (wood or metal)
- a sharp-pointed projection along the top of a fence or wall (or a dinosaur)
- each of the sharp points on the soles of athletic shoes to prevent slipping, or the shoes themselves
= example: each of the sharp points on the soles of athletic shoes to prevent slipping, or the shoes themselves
- a very high narrow heel on women's shoes
= synonyms: spike heel, stiletto heel
- a transient variation in voltage or current
- a sharp rise followed by a sharp decline
= example: a sharp rise followed by a sharp decline
- (botany) an indeterminate inflorescence bearing sessile flowers on an unbranched axis
- fruiting spike of a cereal plant especially corn
= synonyms: ear, capitulum
verb
- manifest a sharp increase
= example: manifest a sharp increase
- to add alcohol to beverages
= example: to add alcohol to beverages
= synonyms: lace
- bring forth a spike or spikes
= synonyms: spike out
- secure with spikes
- pierce with a sharp stake or point
= synonyms: transfix, impale, empale
- stand in the way of
